It's a good warm-up.\""},{"lineNumber":43048,"originalJapaneseLine":"「言われずとも叩き殺してくれるわ、ムシムシ野郎！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You don’t even have to tell me; I’ll beat you to death, you bug bastard!"},{"lineNumber":43049,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とーーーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Tooooooo!\""},{"lineNumber":43050,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだな、今は時間が欲しい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That’s right, I want some time for now.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「スノー……レーザー！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Snow... Laser!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一直線に、冷気の帯が地面を抉り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a straight line, a band of cold air gouged the ground,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアの足先まで伸びる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stretching all the way to Galtia's feet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その通り道にいた魔物達が貫かれて凍てつき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monsters standing in its path were pierced and frozen over,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒れていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: falling down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、うおおぉっ！？　あ、あそこか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-ohhh!? There, over there!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法使いが、こんな所まで……殺せ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A mage, even here... kill them!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言われるより早く、魔物兵たちが二人の人間に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before they were told, the monster soldiers rushed towards the two humans,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺到するが……その直前、男の詠唱が終わった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but just before that, the man's chant ended.
"Now then...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 喰らえ、ゼットン！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Take this, Zetton!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スノーレーザーが撃ち込まれ、凍てついた道筋に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The snow laser was fired, and along the frozen path,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正確に極大の火球が叩き込まれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a massive fireball struck precisely.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おおおっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-ohhh!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冷えきった空間に熱の塊が直撃し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ball of heat slammed into the chilled space,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲一面に霧のように濃い水蒸気が充満した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: filling the surrounding area with thick mist-like steam.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぉっ！？　み、見えねえ！　この辺か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa!? I-I can't see! Around here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いてぇっ！　やめろてめえ、なにしやがる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ouch! Stop it, you bastard! What are you doing!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 視界を奪われ、密集していた魔物兵に混乱が生じた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their vision taken away, the tightly packed monster soldiers became confused.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中には、早々に同士討ちを始める魔物もいる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among them, some monsters quickly began fighting each other.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい……なんのつもりだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey... what are you trying to do!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目を使わん者、何人か！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some of you who don’t use your eyes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スーツを脱いで周囲を確認しろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: take off your suits and check the surroundings!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いーや、その暇は……ねぇなあ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, there isn’t... time for that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がーーーーははははは！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gwah—hahahahaha!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちぇすとーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chestooo!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぎゃああああああ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gyaaaaaaaah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 霧を裂いて、何者かの刃が魔物将軍を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cutting through the mist, someone's blade struck the monster general

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一撃で切り伏せた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: down with a single blow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へえ、あんたか……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, it’s you...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははははは！　俺様参上！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahahaha! I have arrived!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だっ、りゃーーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Daryaaaaaa!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「にょほほーーい、不意打ちもらったーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nyohhoh— I got you with a sneak attack!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣カオスとガルティアの蛮刀が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon sword Chaos and Galtia's savage blade,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真っ向から噛み合った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: clashed head-on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ、防ぎやがった！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, you blocked it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺が見えなくとも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even though I can't see,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ムシどもが見ていてくれるからなぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the bugs are watching out for me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアが剣を払い、互いに半歩の距離を取る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Galtia brushed aside the sword and they both took half a step back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やるなあ。俺の腹の中から出れたのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not bad. So you managed to come out from inside my stomach.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな方法あったんだな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So there was such a method..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、俺様に不可能はない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, nothing is impossible for me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 右手で握る蛮刀の柄に左手を添え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Placing his left hand on the handle of the savage blade gripped in his right hand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ガルティアは得物を水平に構えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon Galtia held his weapon horizontally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいぜ、来いよ。相手になってやる。腹ごなしだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, come on. I'll take you on. It's a good warm-up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「言われずとも叩き殺してくれるわ、ムシムシ野郎！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You don’t even have to tell me; I’ll beat you to death, you bug bastard!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とーーーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tooooooo!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだな、今は時間が欲しい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That’s right, I want some time for now."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ball of heat slammed into the chilled space,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: filling the surrounding area with thick mist-like steam.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いてぇっ！　やめろてめえ、なにしやがる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ouch! Stop it, you bastard! What are you doing!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 視界を奪われ、密集していた魔物兵に混乱が生じた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their vision taken away, the tightly packed monster soldiers became confused.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中には、早々に同士討ちを始める魔物もいる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among them, some monsters quickly began fighting each other.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey... what are you trying to do!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目を使わん者、何人か！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some of you who don’t use your eyes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スーツを脱いで周囲を確認しろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: take off your suits and check the surroundings!"

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, there isn’t... time for that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちぇすとーーーー！」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぎゃああああああ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gyaaaaaaaah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 霧を裂いて、何者かの刃が魔物将軍を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cutting through the mist, someone's blade struck the monster general

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一撃で切り伏せた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: down with a single blow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へえ、あんたか……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, it’s you...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははははは！　俺様参上！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahahaha! I have arrived!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だっ、りゃーーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Daryaaaaaa!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「にょほほーーい、不意打ちもらったーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nyohhoh— I got you with a sneak attack!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣カオスとガルティアの蛮刀が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon sword Chaos and Galtia's savage blade,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真っ向から噛み合った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: clashed head-on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ、防ぎやがった！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, you blocked it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺が見えなくとも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even though I can't see,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ムシどもが見ていてくれるからなぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the bugs are watching out for me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアが剣を払い、互いに半歩の距離を取る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Galtia brushed aside the sword and they both took half a step back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やるなあ。俺の腹の中から出れたのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not bad. So you managed to come out from inside my stomach.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな方法あったんだな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So there was such a method..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、俺様に不可能はない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, nothing is impossible for me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 右手で握る蛮刀の柄に左手を添え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Placing his left hand on the handle of the savage blade gripped in his right hand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ガルティアは得物を水平に構えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon Galtia held his weapon horizontally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいぜ、来いよ。相手になってやる。腹ごなしだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, come on. I'll take you on. It's a good warm-up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「言われずとも叩き殺してくれるわ、ムシムシ野郎！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You don’t even have to tell me; I’ll beat you to death, you bug bastard!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とーーーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tooooooo!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだな、今は時間が欲しい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That’s right, I want some time for now."
